name: generate_metadata
description: Generates metadata for an image, including descriptions, a caption, and relevant tags.

caption.description: A brief description of the image, capturing its main elements in one or two sentences.

longcaption.description: A detailed description of the image, elaborating on its content, context, and notable features.

assettitle.description: A concise title suitable for social media or gallery display.

googlekeywords.description: A list of relevant tags or keywords associated with the image.
